entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
